title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6400.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6400.1 - Definitions

State Regulations

For the purposes of this Part: (a) the term council means the New York State

Council on the Arts, a State agency; (b) the term record or records means any
file, memorandum, document or other matter referred to in section 86 of the

Freedom of Information Law; (c) the
term executive director means the executive director of the council; and
(d) the term records access
officer means an employee of the council from time to time designated by the
executive director to receive and respond to inquiries to inspect and copy
records maintained by the council. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6400.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
